member.name: T:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver
member.summary: The TrackedPoseDriver component applies the current Pose value of a tracked device to the transform of the GameObject. TrackedPoseDriver can track multiple types of devices including XR HMDs, controllers, and remotes.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.DeviceType
member.summary: This is used to indicate what type of device the Tracked Pose Driver is currently tracking

member.name: T:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose
member.summary: This is used to indicate which pose the Tracked Pose Driver is currently tracking

member.name: T:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackingType
member.summary: This enum is used to indiciate which parts of the pose will be applied to the parent transform

member.name: T:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.UpdateType
member.summary: This is used to indicate what points in the frame the tracked pose driver will sample input

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.LeftEye
member.summary: The left eye of a HMD style device

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.RightEye
member.summary: The right eye of a HMD style device

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.Center
member.summary: The center eye of a HMD style device, this is usually the default for most HMDs

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.Head
member.summary: The head eye of a HMD style device

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.LeftPose
member.summary: The left hand controller pose

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.RightPose
member.summary: The right hand contoller pose

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackedPose.ColorCamera
member.summary: The color camera of a mobile device

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackingType.RotationAndPosition
member.summary: With this setting, both the pose's rotation and position will be applied to the parent transform

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackingType.RotationOnly
member.summary: With this setting, only the pose's rotation will be applied to the parent transform

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.TrackingType.PositionOnly
member.summary: With this setting, only the pose's position will be applied to the parent transform

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.UpdateType.UpdateAndBeforeRender
member.summary: Sample input at both update, and directly before rendering. For smooth head pose tracking, we recommend using this value as it will provide the lowest input latency for the device. This is the default value for the UpdateType option

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.UpdateType.Update
member.summary: Only sample input during the update phase of the frame.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.UpdateType.BeforeRender
member.summary: Only sample input directly before rendering

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.DeviceType.GenericXRDevice
member.summary: An Generic XR Devices, use this value for HMD and AR Mobile device tracking

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.DeviceType.GenericXRController
member.summary: An XR Controller, use this value for controllers

member.name: F:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.DeviceType.GenericXRRemote
member.summary: An XR Remote, use this value for mobile remotes

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.deviceType
member.summary: The device being tracked by the tracked pose driver

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.poseSource
member.summary: The pose being tracked by the tracked pose driver

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.trackingType
member.summary: The tracking type being used by the tracked pose driver

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.updateType
member.summary: The update type being used by the tracked pose driver

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpatialTracking.TrackedPoseDriver.UseRelativeTransform
member.summary: This is used to indiciate whether the tracked pose driver will use the objects original transform as its basis.
